page.title: 04Sportsday.
page.content: Every year the whole school takes part in a Sportsday.There are running races,sack races,obstacle races,three-legged races and relay races. In a sack race you have to run or jump inside a sack. In a three-legged race,two children have to run together with a leg tied together.In the obstacle race,you have to go under a rope,through a hoop,pick up beanbags and finish the race in a sack. You are given points for coming first second or third.At the end of the Sports a cup is presented to the best boy and girl.
